tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We visited Dr Anil Patil for treatment of my Mother-in-law's Knee issue.
Dr. Anil as a Consultant: Dr Anil was very quick to check and get the basic tests done and advise the treatment required and treatment plan.
His swiftness to assess the issue and give confidence the patient and  their family of the treatment required and how it benefits etc is really good.
Dr Anil makes sure that he explains the situation in a way that even a layman can understand. This really helps the patient and their family  to ask more questions and understand better. This environment for open discussion eases a lot of inhibitions.

Dr. Anil as a Surgeon: I must say he is gifted with good hands that do wonders . My mother-in Law's bilateral TKR  is a testimony of this. she could not thanks Dr. Anil enough for making her quality of life better where she had lost all hopes. We are happy that we choose Dr Anil as our health care provider.

Sparsh Hospital: Dr Anil asked us to get admitted  at Sparh Hospital at Yashwanhpur and gave a contact of Sheethal for completing  the insurance pre-auth formalities. Sheethal got this authorization very quickly and advised us the date of admission. on the day of admission, I was very scared  as I saw a room full of customers discussing various issue at the billing department. I thought, I will have to go through this ordeal to have my bills settled even though I had complete per-authorization from my insurer.
This is where Sheethal come in and helps me right with the admission process to discharge. I am glad that I had Sheethal by my side who took utmost care of the queries,  issues/ concerns that we had. Her calm approach makes it very pleasant experience at the hospital and my initial impressions were totally ironed out.
Sheethal is truly a reflection of her name and her customer oriented approach is highly appreciable. 
My whole family was very happy that we had such good experience at Sparsh Hospital Yashwanthpur. 
 Thank you Sheethal for being so helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr. Anil Patil after I twisted my knee. I found out about him through online search, so did not have the benefit of the confidence that comes with going to a doctor referred by someone. I however placed my trust in the reviews and went to him with an open mind.

I am happy to say that my experience has been overwhelmingly positive with him. He devoted sufficient time for listening to me, doing the examination/assessment and  finally explaining everything to me in a way that I could understand. Based on this interaction I opted to undergo surgery as per his recommendation.

One thing I found especially remarkable was the accuracy of his assessment... Other doctors told me that I had ACL & MCL damage while he said that I had actually suffered MPFL damage after examining me in the same manner. This was later confirmed by the MRI scan. He also explained in detail the different levels of surgical intervention open to me (due to some issue with my bone structure), the risks associated with each option and left the decision making to me without forcing anything upon me.  

The surgery went off exactly like he said. He has been extremely approachable and supportive post surgery, constantly follows up on my progress and takes time to clarify even the smallest doubts that I have. It has been 8 weeks since my surgery and my rehabilitation has been progressing smoothly and as I had hoped.

One minor issue I faced was that the access to his clinic is challenging for people with leg problems... However he has taken my feedback in this regard positively and promised to find a solution soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would fist prefer to recommend this doctor for sports related injuryI'm an avid runner with the history of couple of stress fractures in the same location in past 2 years, reason was the wrong running form. couple of occasion was the wait/rest coming back to running with the doubt in mind for recurrence.This time around I wanted a holistic solution around this met through of the reference in Lilavathi Hospital, Mumbai. First phone call to his clinic led me to reach Sparsh hospital with all the reports around deeply analysed my case, options were clearly put on plate for me to decide on after going through the pros and cons of the prognosis.with this I opted to go for a surgery on my left leg all deligently planned he took complete interest of my case right from admission to discharge process.post surgery care was even more fantastic frequently monitored to ensure the cut area doesn't lead to any further infections and charting down the rehabilitation plan. since I was trained in these I attended only two sessions and rest I managed to do at home.happy to say within exactly 2 months from post operation I was able to get back to runnimg for 2020 my running milege stands at 2K and going strong.thanks Anil for all your support

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Firstly I would like to thank Mr Anil Patil sir for helping me out with my problems with ACL tear & meniscus injury why because I had waited for a good doctor for around years to undergo surgery even I consulted several reputed orthopaedic doctors but I dint find a person like you who treated me not only like a patient but also like a brother ...even I finded Anil sir through Google but from the first visit itself I liked him why because the polite way of understanding our problems or pain and impressive way of giving a right solution in a better ,simple or right way .... Beacuse of him I decided to undergo surgery and on one fine day I done with it and even surgery got successful and after surgery also he took a special care he guided me the does and don'ts I too followed him genuinely and now after one and half month of surgery I am feeling free to walk well & I can do exercises ... once again I am thankful for your support sir to overcome my injury & I like you to be my life time orthopedition and even I suggest all ,my family members and my friends for any kind of Ortho probs and sports injury to consult Anil Patil sir by eyes closed coz I am the live example...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have undergone Arthroscopic ligament reconstruction surgery a week back , and I'm getting better now.
Thanks to Dr. Anil Patil sir , for being so patient while listening to my complaints and also for the patience they have shown while clearing my every single queries.
The surgery was done successfully without any problem
Thanks to Dr. Anil sir and team , and also to  the anaesthesia staff for calming down my anxiety during the surgery .
The hospital staff is supportive and they took good care of me even in general ward.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Anil is an incredible and competent doctor. I saw him for tennis elbow pain I had suffered with for a very long time.

I appreciate how he took his time to explain my condition with me as well as my treatment options. From anti-inflammatories to the injection, he was indispensable to me through this process.

It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such a kind, empathetic attitude and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. 

I would have no qualms in recommending Dr Anil to anyone for their orthopedic needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited Dr. Anil for my long standing ankle issue, and I was very much satisfied with his calm & humble personality.
He took his time, allowed me to explain the problem to him & then he shared his diagnosis with me.
And since I live far away from his clinic, he asked me to just send the soft copies of MRI. He spent some time with a Radiologist & confirmed i have damage in my ligament.

He has suggested going for surgery, but I'm trying exercises for now.

He responds to msgs as much as it is possible for him. 

I would really recommend visiting him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Visited after ankle twistDr.Anil patil is incredible. I had consulted him after i twisted my ankle totally 6 times in few years and as it happened many times he told to take MRI, as in the result ATFL had a complete tear, so he suggested for surgery, not only has he taken great care of my (Anterior Talofibular Ligament reconstruction surgery procedures, but also he is very friendly to speak to at every appointment about any issues you have. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend him for his dedicated care towards his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is Avery friendly doctor who respects his patients in term of time, money and limited knowledge they carry. He tries to educate them and provides immense confidence to the patient. He is very prompt, active and at the same time sensitive. He tells you to think and understand the condition completely before deciding on anything. I consulted him for my mom who has knee problem. He initially said surgery might not be required but later seeing scans he showed the damage and asked us to decide. I am very happy and felt we are in good hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ***** ******* *** ** *** **** ****** ****** *********** He listens calmly to you and understands your situation and clears your doubt. Got my ACL reconstruction surgery with Dr.Anil PatilDetailed review: After I got my knee injury I went on internet in search of orthopedician. Found Dr.Anil Patil and his reviews were too good on Google and Practo, I was little speculative about him at the very beginning. But how he handled my situation made me completely trust him. After initial physical test he doubted about ACL tear which was later confirmed by MRI. Dr. suggested for ACL reconstruction and later I spoke to few more orthopedicians but I didn't feel confident and comfortable with anybody else. After 2 weeks of my injury I got my ACL reconstruction done. I'm currently under rehab and in hope to recover completely . Even now he communicates well and clears my doubt time to time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a longstanding knee issue and was visiting Bangalore for a short duration. I found Dr. Anil based on google and practo reviews *** ***** **** *** *** ** *** **** ********* * ******
Dr. Anil is extremely pragmatic, suggests treatments/tests only if it is necessary. He was also very approachable and also makes time to ensure that everyone understands the reason and the cause for the issue. 

Over the last 3 months, My brother got his knee operated, My mother visited him for knee pain, So did some of my friends and relatives. All of them were extremely happy and satisfied. 
Me recommending my family and friends  to him speaks of my experience with him.

Thanks again Dr. Anil !
Would recommend him any day.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Anil Patil is a very professional and a good doctor. He always tries to understand and diagnose the problem properly. Doesn't prescribes unnecessary medicines or treatment. His way of treating the patients is very simple *** *********. For not having any gaps between him and patients, he always makes sure that the patient understands the problem and the treatment himself. This makes the process very transparent and the patient feels confident about the treatment and naturally the result is bound to be positive. I would highly recommend him.
Thanks, Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Slip Disc,Rotator Cuff Injury Treatment,Muscle Weakness,
review: Doctor Anil successfully treated and operated my mother for a rotator cuff issue in her right shoulder, which she suffered with for three long years. She is very thankful to the doctor. I went to him again to treat my sciatica pain due to a disc slip in my lower back. He referred me to his friend who is a spine specialist and followed up to check the progress of my treatment. He has always been extremely patient, friendly and kind during our consultations. It is rare to find such doctors these days. He has become our family doctor and we trust his expertise. We highly recommend him to friends, family and all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Initially I had a knee pain for almost 3-4months which was making me uncomfortable to walk or sit, was thinking some internal injuries might have occurred. I visited Dr.Anil‚Äôs clinic and felt very friendly, ******** ********* ***** *** ***** gave the explanation and also taught few exercises to do which would cure the pain.. After few days by following the instructions gave by doctor has completely cured my knee pain..
Am also getting treated for my mother for the same which even she is also feeling comfortable and relaxed with her knee and anckle pain for the medication and exercise.. Genuine for patience not like others who generally prefers to go for x-Ray or MRI‚Äôs or other expensive scans or treatments for even a small injuries, usually Dr Anil prefers no unnecessary formalities as such.. Thank you Dr.Anil for the treatment.

review:
I found Dr Anil Patil to be courteous and patient with me . In today fast paced life I found Dr Anil to be able to give so much time for each patient as I had observed in the waiting room . He was unlike other doctors whom I have met before who give offer a diagnosis or medicines without even touching me . I found him to do a lot of tests which i obviously didn't understand .  My wife too had a pleasant experience during the course of her treatment for her ankle sprain .

I strongly recommend visiting his clinic for orthopaedic sports injuries .

I would definitely recommend this doctor.
